title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1771/95 of 24 July 1995 amending for the sixth time Regulation (EC) No 3146/94 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in Germany
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No 1771/95 of 24 July 1995 amending for the sixth time  Regulation (EC) No 3146/94 adopting exceptional support measures for the market in pigmeat in  Germany
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official  Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 July 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
